downloadNoLists: æ_There are no lists to export. Go to My lists to create a list of features______________________________________Â.
noNotifications: æ_You have no notification list yet__________________Â.
selectLayerAndAdd: æ_To create a list, select an input layer and click Create new list. Features from the selected input layer will be added to your list____________________________________________________________________Â.
selectSearchTip: æ_Use tools like sketch, search distance, or selection layer to select features from the input layer to add to your list_____________________________________________________________Â.
selectLayerTip: æ_Draw shapes to select features from the chosen selection layer; the results will be used to select features from the addressee layer___________________________________________________________________Â
selectSketchTip: æ_Use sketch tools to draw graphics in the map to select intersecting features in the addressee layer___________________________________________________Â.
listHasSetsTip: æ_Edit or delete existing lists or choose a layer and click Create new list______________________________________Â
exportTip: æ_Select lists to include in file export. Choose to export lists to either a .csv or .pdf file________________________________________________Â.
title: æ_Title___________Â
refineTip: æ_Refine and finalize your lists by using sketch tools to add or remove features across all selection sets______________________________________________________Â.
refineTipNoSelections: æ_There are no selections to refine. Go to My lists to create a list of features_________________________________________Â.
